vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play (patch_16.sol#79-99) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play.wager (local variable @ patch_16.sol#83) shadows:
	- PoCGame.wager (function @ patch_16.sol#70-77)
